content: Be passionate about your company and loyal to your team, but remember markets and product lines shift. Passion and enthusiasm can come from a love of find opportunities and executing on them, even if it’s garbage hauling or fixing teeth. By all means, if you’re Reed Hastings 2.0, start the next Netflix, but don’t let a label like “boring” be the thing that stops you from starting a billion dollar business in a “blah” market.
